alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:44PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Louisa and northeastern Fluvanna Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ferncliff, or 8 miles northeast of Palmyra, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Mineral, Ferncliff, Bybee, Pendleton, Louisa Airport, Byrd Mill, Trevilians, Zion Crossroads and Vawter Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
